LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonMilk.label: ambergris excretion
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonMilk.description: Highly nutritious excrement is produced by adult loongs. They will collect it regularly. The excretion will stop during malnutrition or other special circumstances.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonTailBW.label: azure tail
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonTailBW.description: The tail of porcelain loongs. They're miraculously soft but hard, and chilly to touch. It might be a good idea to sleep during the summer with one of this between your arms.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonTailCB.label: green tail
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonTailCB.description: The thick and muscular tail of a pureblood loong. Strong enough to break a few bones if it hits somebody.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonTailPC.label: crimson tail
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonTailPC.description: The red tail of a papercut loong. A membrane structure extends from the tail, which is often cut short like human's nails. They're often tailored for style.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonTailWJ.label: jade tail
LanguageData.NY_hediff_DragonTailWJ.description: A white tail with traces of green. Valued by white jade loongs, they're widely considered beautiful.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_EvilBreak.label: evil's bane
LanguageData.NY_hediff_EvilBreak.description: This entity is deemed evil by the evil bane blade and is weakened by it.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_EvilTone.label: soul disruption
LanguageData.NY_hediff_EvilTone.description: An enchanted tone echo in the mind, looking for a weakpoint to breakthrough.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonBW.label: porcelain loong
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonBW.description: Blue eyes shine between their silver hairs, and decorated with blue horns, the porcelain loongs are known for being great wives, handy in all sort of houseworks.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonCB.label: pureblood loong
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonCB.description: Green horns extends from their black hairs, the purebloods possess superhuman strength, a formidable force in battlefield.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonPC.label: papercut loong
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonPC.description: Red horned and red eyed, the papercut loongs are reknowned for their artistic talent, no matter it's music or painting, or tailoring.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonSinner.label: sinner
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonWJ.label: white jade loong
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ForgingDragonWJ.description: White haired with light green eyes, the white jade loongs has keen sights and fast minds.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_KidneyOverdraft.label: exhausted
LanguageData.NY_hediff_KidneyOverdraft.description: It hard to say it's lucky or not to survive long enough to be sold, expecially in a loong's slaver caravan. This person is exhaused in all aspects, physically and mentally and *ahem*. Give this poor soul some time to rest.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_LoongFrenzy.label: bloodburst
LanguageData.NY_hediff_LoongFrenzy.description: Vastly increased blood flow boosted physical performance, but such condition lays heavy burden to one's heart, and cannot last long.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_LoongSmoke.label: smoke breath
LanguageData.NY_hediff_LoongSmoke.description: Smoke is being released as this pawn breathes, providing continuous cover.
